message: I'm starting with a generous offer. Accept and we can seal the deal!
Meet me in the middle, let's make a deal!
I'm willing to give you a smaller share, but I'm still the one calling the shots here!
You're giving me less and less, I want more!
Take it or leave it, Bob! I'm not getting any younger!
You're not getting any younger either, I want a better deal!
Last chance, Bob! Take it or walk away!
You're trying to squeeze me dry, but I'm not going down without a fight!
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it, but don't expect any more concessions from me!
I'm not going to back down, I want a bigger share!
This is my last offer, Bob. Take it or walk away, I'm not making any more concessions!
It's now or never, Alice. I'm taking the last shot!
